tool_description: Find a username availability across multiple social media and other platforms!
name: Username Hunter API
title: Username Hunter API

api_list.name: Fetch Supported Platforms
api_list.description: To retrieve the list of supported platforms.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://username-hunter-api.p.rapidapi.com/supported-platforms"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "username-hunter-api.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
